channel.title: Comments on: Applying Kanban to IT Processes (Part 5)
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Fabrice Aimetti
item.dc:creator: Fabrice Aimetti
item.content:encoded:
Hello Eli,

I have translated your fifth and last article of the series “Applying Kanban to IT Processes”.

What fun/value this trip in 5 steps to Kanban! Thank you!

Regards,
Fabrice

item.title: By: CA Atreya
item.dc:creator: CA Atreya
item.content:encoded:
Good points. I am in the process of leading change in our IT shop – where the same people are involved in operations and projects. It has been a challenge trying to make some key folks see the benefits of Kanban in software development.

What has been your experience in trying to change old habits? How did you overcome all the objections to even pilot this process?

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: This has been an awesome series Tarwn, I have emailed one of the program managers at work who is big into scrum these linke and will let you know what he says
item.content:encoded: This has been an awesome series Tarwn, I have emailed one of the program managers at work who is big into scrum these linke and will let you know what he says
